item.title: Difference of Squares
item.description: Today I am solving the Difference of Squares of the PHP track on Exercism. Exercism offers its users learning new programming languages through exercises with the valuable feedback of mentors. It currently has 50 different language tracks like C#, Go, Kotlin, TypeScript and many others. Head over to Exercism to join. Introduction The source of this exercise is Problem 6 of the Euler project. The sum of the squares of the first ten natural numbers is,
